text: "High Hopes" is a song written by songwriter Tim Scott McConnell and recorded by Bruce Springsteen and E Street Band. It was taken from his EP Blood Brothers (EP). It was originally recorded by Tim Scott McConnell in 1985. ==2013 re-recording== In November 2013, Springsteen released a new recording of the single and used it as the title track to his 18th studio album High Hopes. It went to number 15 on the Billboard Adult Alternative Songs chart. ==References== Category:1985 songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Funk rock songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs
title: High Hopes (Tim Scott McConnell song)
